section.title: Preprocessing
section.p: Additional validation has been added to check e.g. element ID uniqueness, and xml:lang and URI syntax.

section.title: PDF
section.p: Bundled FOP has been updated from 1.0 to 1.1.
Stylesheets for the following transtypes have moved to plug-in specific folders:

ul.li: eclipsehelp
htmlhelp
javahelp
odt
xhtml

section.title: Preprocessing
section.p: The following deprecated Ant properties have been removed:

ul.li: dita.script.dir, use ${dita.plugin.id.dir} instead
dita.resource.dir, use ${dita.plugin.org.dita.base.dir}/resource instead

section.title: XHTML
section.p: XSLT Java extension ImgUtils has been removed from stylesheets and been replaced with preprocessing module ImageMetadataModule. The old ImgUtils Java classes are still included in the build.
